_module_preset=”98ec649d-8194-4072-902f-8123460d0431″ text_orientation=”left” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]At Indo Farm, we are driven by a perpetual curiosity to find new challenges and continuously assess ourselves by the way we overcome them. This earnestness has taken Indo Farm beyond borders and made them popular as the most trustworthy global tractor spare part suppliers. We deliver Indo Farm tractors spare parts to more than 20 countries in the world across Europe, Asia, North and South Africa, and Asia.

We welcome our overseas associate tractor parts exporters and distributors to visit our plant to know us and our products better. Lister Petter, the U.K, and Ursus Poland are our major clients. We pride ourselves to call ourselves the world’s best tractors spare parts manufacturers & suppliers with more than 1000+ satisfactory clients.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”global” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_line_height=”1.9rem” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”3rem” header_3_line_height=”1.7rem” custom_margin=”||14px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Global Presence

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”_initial” text_font_size=”1rem” text_line_height=”1.5rem” custom_margin=”||23px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

  • Indofarm proudly delivers Agriculture & Farming equipment to 20+ Countries, to over 1000+ clients across Europe, Africa & Asia.
  • This reinforces our belief & stamps our quality & ability.
  • We invite you to explore our facility & partner with us for higher global penetration

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”ed3fe2d1-9f31-42ed-9f45-5e5da5628376″ text_font_size=”12px” header_font_size=”23px” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.8rem” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” header_3_font=”|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#535353″ header_3_font_size=”1.8rem” header_3_letter_spacing=”2px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

From India to the world

Desh Ki Shaan

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”ed3fe2d1-9f31-42ed-9f45-5e5da5628376″ text_font_size=”12px” header_font_size=”23px” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.8rem” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” header_3_font=”|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#535353″ header_3_font_size=”1.8rem” header_3_letter_spacing=”2px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Desh Ki Shaan

Domestic Presence

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”98ec649d-8194-4072-902f-8123460d0431″ text_orientation=”left” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]Indo Farm stands strong as the largest and top tractor manufacturer company in India with hi-tech tractors ranging from 22 HP to 110 HP. We built our reputation through manufacturing high-end tractors and distribution of the best farm tractor spare parts in India and the world. According to us, the growth in Agriculture and the scarcity of rural labour will be the drivers for future growth. With a decade of experience in the field of Indian tractor exporter and manufacturer, we gain a competitive edge. Indo Farm has gained huge opportunities to expand the business and it’s poised to take a big leap forward.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#EEF9F0″
